abstract: The president of Chechnya denied a party on his birthday was a celebration of his birth. Instead, he insisted, the celebration marked a kind of rebirth for the city of Grozny, Russia.
snippet: The president of Chechnya denied a party on his birthday was a celebration of his birth. Instead, he insisted, the celebration marked a kind of rebirth for the city of Grozny, Russia.
lead_paragraph: There were lights and music, dancing and a huge display of fireworks. Vanessa-Mae played the violin, and even though Shakira did not attend, the actors Hilary Swank and Jean-Claude Van Damme stopped by.
